mapper.sql: id as id, title as title, teacher_num as teacherNum, teacher_name as teacherName, publish_url as publishUrl, state as state, class_num as classNum, class_name as className, sub_num as subNum, sub_name as subName, stu_num as stuNum, stu_name as stuName, submit_url as submitUrl, update_time as updateTime
mapper.insert: insert into work (id, title, teacher_num, teacher_name, publish_url, state, class_num, class_name, sub_num, sub_name, stu_num, stu_name, submit_url, update_time) values (#{id}, #{title}, #{teacherNum}, #{teacherName}, #{publishUrl}, #{state}, #{classNum}, #{className}, #{subNum}, #{subName}, #{stuNum}, #{stuName}, #{submitUrl}, #{updateTime})

insert into work (id, title, teacher_num, teacher_name, publish_url, state, class_num, class_name, sub_num, sub_name, stu_num, stu_name, submit_url, update_time) values
(#{item.id}, #{item.title}, #{item.teacherNum}, #{item.teacherName}, #{item.publishUrl}, #{item.state}, #{item.classNum}, #{item.className}, #{item.subNum}, #{item.subName}, #{item.stuNum}, #{item.stuName}, #{item.submitUrl}, #{item.updateTime})
mapper.update: update work set is_delete=0 where id = #{id}

update work set
title=#{title},
teacher_num=#{teacherNum},
teacher_name=#{teacherName},
publish_url=#{publishUrl},
state=#{state},
class_num=#{classNum},
class_name=#{className},
sub_num=#{subNum},
sub_name=#{subName},
stu_num=#{stuNum},
stu_name=#{stuName},
submit_url=#{submitUrl},
update_time=#{updateTime}
where id = #{id} and is_delete=1
